header.top: Heather & Adam are very HAPPY to announce
header.title: WE ARE GETTING MARRIED, FOR REAL
header.description: Surprising I know! In this day and age, crazy, who does that? either way if you're here we probably want you to attend.

search.placeholder: Search for your name, or the code included in your invite

process.title: Hello {name}, before we get started.
process.body: We will need you to login into this site, it only requires an email address. We will not keep any details we collect from you beyond

form.title: RSVP
form.intro: To help us plan our day, we would like to get a little bit of information from you, this will help us plan food, accomidation and costs.

dietary.label: Dietary requirements.
dietary.info: Please let us know of any dietry concerns we need to pass onto our caterors.

attendance.label: Attendance decision for {name}
attendance.info: Lets us know if we can expect you.
attendance.weekend: I would like to attend, the weekend
attendance.weekend-info: Arrive Friday (30th Oct), leaveing on Sunday (1st Nov, before 11am)
attendance.day: I would like to attend, the ceremony day
attendance.day-info: Arrive on the day, (before 11:30 please) for ceremony, wedding breakfast and party.

optional.label: I would like to participate in the childrens treasure hunt game.
optional.info: Weddings can be boring for children, so we've decided to put together a treasure hunt for them. You will be supplied candy and a new clue for when a child finds you.

confirmation.title: Submitted by {name}, on {date}
confirmation.not: {name} has indicated they are not coming

about.title: What's happening?
about.intro: Yes it's finally happening, Heather and Adam are getting married, 16 years in the making.

when.body: the ceremony will start at midday so if you’re arriving on the day please arrive by 11:30 so you have time to get seated and comfortable

where.body: Bore Place, Bore Place Road, Chiddingstone, Edenbridge, Kent, TN8 7AR detailed directions and maps can be found here

what.body: Although this is a Halloween wedding, this is not a costume party. Please dress (UK) formally. The bridal party will be dressed in autumnal colours, but feel free to dress  in any colours you like (except white). Weather permitting we hope to hold the ceremony outdoors and on grass so sensible shoes would be advised.

intro.title: Frequently Asked Questions.
intro.subtext: If you can't find an answer here to a question you have; please just message us directly.

deadline.question: When is the RSVP deadline?
deadline.answer: tbd we need to give a date

plan.question: What is the plan?
plan.answer: We have hired a venue from friday night to sunday morning, we hope to accomidate as many as possible. The ceremony will be held on the saturday at the "hide", with wedding breakfast and reception in the "large barn". All within the venue grounds

location.question: How do I get to the venue?
location.answer: The should be plenty of parking if you want to drive. For those comming abroad Gatwick is the closest airport.

dress.question: What is the dress code?
dress.answer: Although its a halloween wedding, its not a costume party, its a formal event, to be in theme we are thinking autumunal colors, but at the end of the day we trust you. Weather permitting we hope to hold the ceremony outdoors and on grass so sensible shoes would be advised.

weather.question: What is the weather like?
weather.answer: We are hoping for an outdoor ceremony, weather permitting, other parts will be held indoors. Autumn in the UK can be cold and rainy so sensible shoes would be advised. We will fall back to a indoor location if we have to, umbrellas will be suppied but we are a hardy outdoor bunch so make sure you have something to keep warm if necessery.

plusOne.question: Can I bring plus one
plusOne.answer: we have limited space so can only really accomidate named invitees at current

food.question: What is a the food situation?
food.answer: Breakfast will be supplied saturday and sunday, friday evening will be tbd for when you arrive. Ceremony day itself will be catored by homegurrown, who will provide canapes, wedding breakfast and evening food.

drink.question: What is a the drink situation?
drink.answer: We will supply wine / bubbles / beer / and non-alcholic varieits on the ceremony day, however if the is a specific drink you'd like to consume your welcome to bring it.

gift.question: Is there a gift registery?
gift.answer: No! and please dont bring gifts or money to the venue. We have been together for 16 years we have everything we need, including multiple bottle openers. Your presence is the gift we're after!

accomidation.question: What is the cost accomidation?
accomidation.answer: Although we would love to pay for everyone, it would be appriciate if guests help us cover a little of the cost

email.signoff: If you have any issues please feel free to contact us, Love Heather & Adam
